ENTITLEMENT STORY: So, I stroll into my favorite coffee shop, wearing my designer suit and flashing my gold Rolex, right? The barista, Jenny, greets me with a smile and asks for my order. I casually tell her I'll have my usual, a triple-shot caramel macchiato with almond milk, no foam-I mean, come on, she should know that by now, right?But get this, Jenny accidentally makes my drink with regular milk instead of almond milk. Can you believe the audacity? I take one sip, and I can immediately tell it's not right. I let out an exasperated sigh and dramatically push the cup back across the counter to her."I specifically asked for almond milk, Jenny," I say, trying to keep my cool but also making sure my disappointment is palpable. She apologizes profusely and offers to make me a new one, but I'm not having it. I demand to speak to the manager because this level of incompetence is simply unacceptable.The manager rushes over, looking concerned, and I launch into a passionate tirade about the importance of customer service and how my entire day has been ruined because of this mistake. I make it clear that they need to do better if they want to keep a prestigious customer like me coming back.In the end, they offer me a free drink coupon and promise to retrain their staff on the intricacies of my coffee order. As I walk out of the coffee shop, coupon in hand, I can't help but feel a sense of triumph. That's right, Hot Josh always gets what he deserves.
